entry.title: Gsheet2json
entry.content:
Gsheet2json

A Java script object to easily read from publicly hosted Google spreadsheets. You can use it as a database for your web application

Quick Start

  • Download and include gsheet2json.js to your project.

  • ``` var sheet = new spreadSheet(

             {url to the publicly hosted spreadsheet},
         {fieldlist as an array},
         {success function}

    ); ```

  • Use sheet.getAsArray() or sheet.getAsObjects()

Example

```

```

http://jsfiddle.net/pasindur/EsGmX/

entry.title: VideoSub Player
entry.content:
Why Video Sub Player?

This is an online video player that can play any streaming link with added subtitles. No need to download the video just go to the site and play along with a subtitle you specify (or what we suggest).

Have a Look at the VideoSubPlayer before moving on

Since some hosting providers have restricted their access to other servers and the file path to the streaming url is complex, I have developed an Firefox Addon that will do all the hard work for you. Basically when it is enabled it will grab videos on the sites you browse and take you to VideoSub Player. It will also bypass any security restriction opposed to stop cross domain streaming.

For more information on Video Grabber can be found here.

Video Grabber can be download from Firefox Repository

Introductory Video

Features

Here are some of the features of the VideoSub Player

  • Free
  • Any Video File
  • Any Modern Browser (How ever the grabber is only for Firefox)
  • Subtitle suggesting
  • Other Streaming links (Experimental)
  • Any Streaming Provider
  • Pseudo streaming (if Server supports)
  • Convenient
  • Movie details via IMDB
  • HTML5 or Flash
Currently the player is deployed for pre alpha and contains minor bugs if your found any bugs please post them on the support forum.

entry.title: Friend Utilities
entry.content:
This is an application that allows users to extend the functionality on Facebook. This basically and extended version of Appearing Offline. It has added support to add animated images to Facebook posts.

This application has more than 1,000+ Facebook installs

entry.title: Similarities
entry.content:
Find similarities among your friends.

This is an application that allows users to find similarities among their friends. Friends with similar names, who studied in same high school, university, who share birthdays and much more

Due to migration of Facebook Developer API this application is not currently functioning. It will be migrated very soon.

entry.title: Tag Friends
entry.content:
Tag their friends with different animation characters or movie heroes.

Due to migration of Facebook Developer API this application is not currently functioning. It will be migrated very soon.
